name: nocfl-js
description: An opinionated S3 storage library informed by ocfl but without versioning

scripts.test: npm run minio && sleep 5 && ./node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand && npm run cleanup
scripts.test:watch: npm run minio && sleep 5 && ./node_modules/.bin/jest --watch --runInBand && npm run cleanup

author: Marco La Rosa
